description: Free your music. Enjoy music from PC and Internet--wirelessly. Connecting to both your PC and audio system, the Philips Streamium network music player NP1100 gives you wireless access to your PC music library and thousands of internet radio stations around the world. It comes with a 30-day free trial of Rhapsody, so you can enjoy full-length songs on the network music player for free. The Philips Streamium network music player opens up a whole new world of exciting music possibilities!
title: Philips NP1100/37 Streamium Network Music Player with 3.0" B&W Display
